sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"增加，增大"或"扩大"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: enlarge, amplify, expand, increase, magnify, multiply, augment
means: enlarge ： 主要指面积或体积等的扩大。
amplify ： 在科技中常指声音的扩大或电磁波的增强。也指补充了细节、详述或扩大内容等。此词系正式用语。
expand ： 指范围、程度、体积和尺寸等方面的扩大或增加。
increase ： 指数量、强度和大小等方面的扩大或增加。
magnify ： 可指用光学仪器使物体看上去显得变大；也指事实上把某物增大，有时用于夸张意味。
multiply ： 通常指自然繁殖而产生的增长，有时也指同类事物数量的成倍增加。
augment ： 较正式用词，一般指在原有的基础上增加含量而扩大。

sentence.Network_en: The ultimate aim is to expand the network further.
sentence.Network_cn: 最终目的是为了进一步拓展该网络。

sentence.Network_en: Health officials are proposing to expand their services by organising counselling.
sentence.Network_cn: 卫生官员计划通过组织咨询来扩展他们的服务。

sentence.Network_en: I owned a bookshop and desired to expand the business.
sentence.Network_cn: 我拥有一家书店，想要扩大业务。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin expandere 'to spread out', from ex- 'out' + pandere 'to spread'

encyclopedia.content: expand是微软自带的解压缩文件！可以解压缩用makecab制作出来的压缩文件！ 展开一个或多个压缩文件。 EXPAND [-r] Source Destination EXPAND -r Source [Destination] EXPAND -D Source.cab [-F:Files] EXPAND Source.cab -F:Files Destination -r 重命名经过扩充的文件。 -D 显示来源中的文件列表。 Source 源文件规格。 可使用通配字符。 -F:Files 从 .CAB 文件扩充的文件的名称。 Destination 目标文件 | 路径规格。 目标可以

entry.def: If something expands or is expanded, it becomes larger.

example.ex: Engineers noticed that the pipes were not expanding as expected...
example.tran: 工程师注意到管道并没有如预期那样膨胀。

example.ex: The money supply expanded by 14.6 per cent in the year to September...
example.tran: 截至9月，当年的货币供应增加了14.6％。

entry.def: If something such as a business, organization, or service expands, or if you expand it, it becomes bigger and includes more people, goods, or activities.

example.ex: The popular ceramics industry expanded towards the middle of the 19th century...
example.tran: 到19世纪中期，大众制陶业得到了发展。

example.ex: The interest rate's coming down. I'll be able to expand or stay in business...
example.tran: 利率正在降低，我可以扩大公司或者维持经营。

means.word_mean: 1. extend in one or more directions;
2. become larger in size or volume or quantity;
3. make bigger or wider in size, volume, or quantity;

sentences.sentence: "expand the house by adding another wing"

means.word_mean: 6. add details, as to an account or idea; clarify the meaning of and discourse in a learned way, usually in writing;

sentences.sentence: "She elaborated on the main ideas in her dissertation"
"The King extended his rule to the Eastern part of the continent"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"出,出去"; 2. 表示"前面的,前任的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出,出去+orbit圆圈,轨道+ant……的→出轨的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 详述的,明确的;坦率的;显然的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出,出去+pli重叠+cit→把重叠的东西弄出
ex出,出去+port港口→出港口→出口
ex出,出去+port港口→出港口→出口

stems_affixes.value_cn: 交换, 调换, 兑换, 交流, 交易
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出,出去+change改变,兑换→变换出去→交换, 调换
ex出,出去+pand扩散→v. 扩张;张开, 发展
ex出,出去+purg纯洁,冲洗+ate做→冲洗出来→净化
ex出,出去+clud关闭+e→关出去→排外

Sentence.sentence: It wants to expand its storage of crude oil.
To expand its scope of business.
When that restaurant became very busy, I decided to expand my business.

The space dreamers end up benefiting all of us—not just because of the way they expand human knowledge, or because of the spin-off technologies they produce, but because the two types of dreams feed off each other.
But Bowman's supporters argue that Monsanto is trying to expand the scope of patents in ways that would enrich big corporations and hurt small farmers

Expanding the three-year option may be difficult, but it may be less difficult than asking Congress for additional financial help, asking legislators for more state support, or asking students even higher tuition payments.

means.word_mean: 使…变大, 扩大, 扩张, 增强（尺码、数量或重要性）

sentences.en: The ranks of the teachers are constantly expanding.
The merchant wants to expand his business.
sentences.cn: 那个商人想扩大他的经营。

means.word_mean: 伸展, 伸开, 张开, 展开

sentences.en: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 许多花瓣在阳光下绽放。

jushi.english: The ranks of the teachers are constantly expanding.
Our foreign trade has expanded during recent years.
jushi.chinese: 我们的对外贸易近年来已得到扩大。

jushi.english: The petals of many flowers expand in the sunshine.
jushi.chinese: 许多花瓣在阳光下绽放。
